Class JsonUtils

      • setJsonEngine

        public static void setJsonEngine(JsonUtils.JsonEngine jsonEngine)
        Sets the JSON engine. Default is Gson.
        Parameters:
        jsonEngine - the json engine.

      • getJsonReader

        public static AwsJsonReader getJsonReader(java.io.Reader in)
        Gets a JSON reader. If no JSON engine is available, an AmazonClientException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        in - reader
        Returns:
        a JSON reader

      • getJsonWriter

        public static AwsJsonWriter getJsonWriter(java.io.Writer out)
        Gets a JSON writer. If no JSON engine is available, an AmazonClientException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        out - writer
        Returns:
        a JSON writer

      • jsonToMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> jsonToMap(java.io.Reader in)
        Convenient method to convert a JSON string to a map. Any object or array will be discarded. Number and boolean are stored as string.
        Parameters:
        in - reader
        Returns:
        a non null, unmodifiable, string to string map

      • jsonToMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> jsonToMap(java.lang.String json)
        Convenient method to convert a JSON string to a map. Any object or array will be discarded. Number and boolean are stored as string.
        Parameters:
        json - a JSON encoding string
        Returns:
        a non null, unmodifiable, string to string map

      • mapToString

        public static java.lang.String mapToString(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
        Encode a string to string map as a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        map - map to be encoded
        Returns:
        a non null JSON string
